mainSection.title: AI-Powered People Counter
mainSection.description: Experience the effectiveness of our AI-powered people counting system, designed to provide accurate real-time insights into visitor traffic. Using advanced computer vision and AI algorithms, this system is capable of counting individuals as they enter or exit an area, providing valuable data for a range of applications.

subSections.title: What is the People Counter?
subSections.description: The AI-Powered People Counter uses computer vision technology to detect and count individuals in real-time. It is designed for use in public spaces, retail stores, events, and any environment where understanding foot traffic can provide operational or business insights.

subSections.title: Purpose and Applications
subSections.description: This people counter system provides actionable data that can be used to optimize resources, improve safety, and better understand visitor patterns. It's ideal for managing occupancy, gathering visitor statistics, and analyzing peak times.

rotatingSections.title: Real-Time Visitor Counting
rotatingSections.description: Learn how the people counter system uses AI to count individuals entering or exiting an area in real time, ensuring accuracy and efficiency.
bulletPoints: Accurate real-time counting of visitors.
Uses computer vision for precise detection.
Ideal for monitoring entrances and exits.
Ensures accurate data even during peak hours.

rotatingSections.title: Applications in Retail
rotatingSections.description: Discover how the people counter system can benefit retail environments, helping store managers understand visitor patterns and optimize staff deployment.
bulletPoints: Understand customer flow and peak hours.
Optimize staffing based on visitor traffic.
Measure the impact of promotions and events.
Improve store layout based on visitor behavior.

rotatingSections.title: Occupancy Management
rotatingSections.description: Explore how this system can be used to manage occupancy in real-time, ensuring safety and compliance with regulations in crowded spaces.
bulletPoints: Real-time occupancy monitoring for safety.

rotatingSections.title: Data-Driven Insights

Useful in stadiums, transportation hubs, and public events.
